pr_title: Fix method summary of Transaction.completion javadoc

timeline.message:
Fix method summary of Transaction.completion javadoc

* "and" is missing in the method summary of Transaction.completion on
  https://vertx-web-site.github.io/docs/apidocs/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.html

* "rollbacks" should be "rolls back".

Old text:

"Return the transaction completion Future that succeeds when the transaction
commits fails with TransactionRollbackException when the transaction
rollbacks"

New text:

"Return the transaction completion Future that succeeds when the transaction
commits and fails with TransactionRollbackException when the transaction
rolls back"

Signed-off-by: Julian Ladisch <eclipse.org-rtn@ladisch.de>

Fix method summary of Transaction.completion javadoc

* "and" is missing in the method summary of Transaction.completion on
  https://vertx-web-site.github.io/docs/apidocs/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.html

* "rollbacks" should be "rolls back".

Old text:

"Return the transaction completion Future that succeeds when the transaction
commits fails with TransactionRollbackException when the transaction
rollbacks"

New text:

"Return the transaction completion Future that succeeds when the transaction
commits and fails with TransactionRollbackException when the transaction
rolls back"

Signed-off-by: Julian Ladisch <julianladisch@users.noreply.github.com>

Fix method summary of Transaction.completion javadoc

* "and" is missing in the method summary of Transaction.completion on
  https://vertx-web-site.github.io/docs/apidocs/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.html

* "rollbacks" should be "rolls back".

Old text:

"Return the transaction completion Future that succeeds when the transaction
commits fails with TransactionRollbackException when the transaction
rollbacks"

New text:

Signed-off-by: Julian Ladisch <julianladisch@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: why is and added ? it's a bullet list
timeline.author: vietj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,8 +51,8 @@ * Return the transaction completion {@code Future} that * *
    - *
  • succeeds when the transaction commits
    • - *
  • fails with {@link TransactionRollbackException} when the transaction rollbacks
    • + *
  • succeeds when the transaction commits and

replies.bodyText:
"and" is missing in the method summary of Transaction.completion on
https://vertx-web-site.github.io/docs/apidocs/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.html because all browsers that I've tested don't show any bullet list: Firefox, Opera, Chrome, Safari
replies.author: julianladisch

replies.bodyText: ok, then I think best is that you also remove the UL/LI markup in your PR
replies.author: vietj

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/vertx-sql-client/src/main/java/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.java b/vertx-sql-client/src/main/java/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.java index 2d7d1fd5..7cf8fe0b 100644 --- a/vertx-sql-client/src/main/java/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.java +++ b/vertx-sql-client/src/main/java/io/vertx/sqlclient/Transaction.java @@ -49,11 +49,8 @@ public interface Transaction { /** * Return the transaction completion {@code Future} that - * - *
    - *
  • succeeds when the transaction commits and
    • - *
  • fails with {@link TransactionRollbackException} when the transaction rolls back
    • - *
+ * succeeds when the transaction commits and + * fails with {@link TransactionRollbackException} when the transaction rolls back. * * @return the transaction result */

timeline.message:
Remove <ul><li> markup that is not exported to apidocs

Signed-off-by: Julian Ladisch <julianladisch@users.noreply.github.com>
